videos.description: LeBron James gets the over-the-shoulder feed from Malik Monk and slams it down.

videos.description: Klay Thompson heads to the locker room with 0:57 left in the half.

videos.description: Steph Curry makes a ridiculous underhanded shot after the foul that doesn't count.

videos.headline: Even when it doesn't count, Steph doesn't miss

videos.description: LeBron James drives hard to the basket and makes a fancy dunk against the Warriors.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron shows no mercy with this slam) 2022/03/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron shows no mercy with this slam

videos.description: Carmelo hits the fadeaway jumper at the buzzer to end the third quarter

videos.headline: LeBron throws down alley-oop from Monk late in Lakers' win

videos.description: LeBron James draws the defense and kicks it out to Carmelo Anthony for a clutch 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Melo drills dagger 3 on assist from LeBron) 2022/03/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Melo drills dagger 3 on assist from LeBron

videos.description: LeBron James has his highest scoring total with the Lakers with 56 points to lead Los Angeles past the Warriors.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (LeBron goes off for 56 points in Lakers' win over the Warriors) 2022/03/06 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: LeBron goes off for 56 points in Lakers' win over the Warriors

videos.description: LeBron James walks by Matthew Stafford near the end of the game to tell him he put on a show for him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron tells Stafford he had to put on a show for him) 2022/03/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron tells Stafford he had to put on a show for him

videos.description: LeBron James details how important the win over the Warriors was for the Lakers.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (LeBron: Victory over Warriors was a 'desperation' win) 2022/03/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron: Victory over Warriors was a 'desperation' win
